content:
@John Baez Could you kindly suggests to me an interesting (for you) paper according to my current skills to push them further ?
Higher category theory will do.

I'm not quite sure what you're looking for... how about this?

  • Max Kelly and Ross Street, Review of the elements of 2-category theory.
this will do, but is there an electronic copy ?

Jan Pax said:

this will do, but is there an electronic copy ?

If you'd clicked the link I gave you, you'd have gotten an electronic copy!

John, your link goes to a paywall!
image.png

Oh, sorry - that's weird. I must be signed into Springer in some way, because the link just gives me a PDF file - no paywall! It's weird because I'm not on UCR's virtual private network. Springer must have cookies in my browser!

Which reminds me of my new blog article:

  • Surveillance publishing.

“massive over-payment of academic publishers has enabled them to buy surveillance technology covering the entire workflow that can be used not only to be combined with our private data and sold, but also to make algorithmic (aka ‘evidenceled’) employment decisions.”
